summary: Timeline_6 follows a journey through PTSD treatment with increasing use of coping strategies.

posts.text: I feel like such a failure. I'm worthless and pathetic Can't stop thinking about hurting myself. I gave up trying But I remembered my safety plan called the crisis hotline and texted my sponsor. I'm not giving up
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Thinking about stopping my meds. I'm broken beyond repair I haven't showered in a week Called my psychiatrist first. tried a new coping mechanism We're trying a different medication instead. I acknowledge my progress
maladaptive_evidence: I haven't showered in a week
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: I've been isolating myself from everyone. Life is meaningless I'm failing at everything But today I reached out to an old friend reached out to my therapist and we made plans to meet up. I'm proud of myself for trying
adaptive_evidence: I'm proud of myself for trying
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Can't handle the pressure anymore. I deserve to suffer I gave up trying Started setting better boundaries at work. asked for support Learned to say no to extra projects. I'm working on self-compassion
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: My partner and I have been fighting constantly. I deserve to suffer I feel like I'm ruining everything. I don't care about anything anymore We decided to try couples therapy. called the crisis hotline Had our first session and it went better than expected. Small steps are still progress
maladaptive_evidence: I don't care about anything anymore
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Thought I was getting better but I'm not. I'm worthless and pathetic Back to square one. I can't see a future for myself Reminded myself that recovery isn't linear. tried a new coping mechanism Reaching out for support instead of giving up. I'm worth the effort
maladaptive_evidence: I can't see a future for myself
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: I relapsed again last night. I feel completely hopeless I hate myself for it. I gave up trying Called my therapist this morning started going to therapy and we talked through it. Small steps are still progress
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: I feel anxious all the time. I can't do anything right I gave up trying Started using the coping strategies from therapy. took my medication as prescribed I'm trying to be patient with myself. Small steps are still progress
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Everything feels impossible. I feel completely hopeless I'm worthless. I isolated myself from all my friends Did one small thing today - made my bed. tried a new coping mechanism Trying to celebrate tiny victories. I deserve to get better
maladaptive_evidence: I isolated myself from all my friends
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: My partner and I have been fighting constantly. I want to give up on everything I feel like I'm ruining everything. I'm completely numb We decided to try couples therapy. used my DBT skills Had our first session and it went better than expected. I'm not giving up
maladaptive_evidence: I want to give up on everything
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping
